The killers are overpowered. It's far too easy for the killer to see and catch you and at that point it's all over. 
Once you you're on the meat hook even without attempting to free yourself the spikes come down far too quickly and you're dead
If you want to play as a killer the queue times are insanely long. 
Overall it's not fun because its too one sided. Refunded.

arkadaşlarla oynarken eğlenceli aksi halde kanser olma ihtimaliniz fazla. Oyunun fiyatını ve dlc'lerin fiyatlarını artırarak ne yapmaya çalışıyolar anlamadım 99tl oyun ve dlc başına 34tl kesinlikle hak etmiyor. Oyuna tekrardan bakıp ya biz bunu düzeltelim demek yerine oyuna zırtpırt yeni karakterler ekliyorlar yeni perkler geldikçe de oyunun dengesi kayıyor. Bugları düzeltmek yerine oyuncuların erişebildiği özellikleri komple kaldırıyorlar. Firma hiçbir şeyin değil veya bilerek yapıyor. MMR Sistemi zaten leş. 1000 saati olan adam 350(ben) saati olanla karşı karşıya geliyor.

Бегаю от зайчика, она кидает топоры они прилетают в пространство в котором нет моей модельки. Я умираю. У меня горит жопа. Кидаю репорт за эксплойты. Зайчик пишет: "gg noobs". Мне конкретно рвет жопу. Я разъ*бываю свой пк за 100500 миллионов. Покупкаю новый пк за 100р на авито. Скачиваю туда дбд. Приходит Чума и шлет меня нах*й! Денег на пк больше не остается! Играю на мобиле. 11/10 порваных жоп!

Bad Game Design 101

- Graphics on Ultra still looks like a playstation 2 game at 60FPS
- Pay to win
- Microtransactions 
- Horror theme is unimaginative and super cliche derrivitive
- Bad sound effects, annoying
- Cliched music
- Killers feel sluggish and unfun to play 
- Basic options menu similar to mobile games
- Character copyright theft
- No region lock so you will be playing with people from different continents at 300 ping
- Bad ping makes games unwinable/unplayable as you can never catch/escape with lag
- Tutorials are a basic 1 page screen
- No skill based matchmaking everyone in game will be wildly different skill levels
- Maps play out the same mostly
- Insane que time as playerbase is dying
- Awful ready up system and select killer/survivor system instead of the computer automatically configuring matches like most games
- Upgrade system creates snowball effect on higher experince players that will have enhanced characters compared to new players
- Racist players not banned check my screenshots

DONT BUY THE GAME...
I love this game, but now only found kids using killer that only know camp and tunnel. 9-10 matches have a tunnel/camper killer. People think that to win in this game you must kill all the survivors. But in this game there arent winers or loosers. And the kids dont understand this, and they are killing the game and the comunity.
You hit me and hook me? perfect. But when somebody help me, dont go to hit an hook me again. Give chance, go to try catch other survivor.
If you buy this game today, you are trowing your money to the trash. The creators now only want money, and money and money and they dont care to have a nice comunity in their game. Only battle pass, money, skins, more money.... "People stop play our game in two weeks because is frustrating and impossible play a normal and funny match? we dont care, he gave us his money, is all what we want"

Il gioco ha un grande potenziale, e mi dispiace dirlo questo potenziale é sprecato. Dico questo perché all'interno del gioco é presente una gran varietà di killer, survivor, mappe e un ancora gran più numero di abilità e cosmetici vari. Tutto questo è acquistabile con soldi veri oppure farmando la valuta di gioco.
Fin qui sembra tutto bellissimo, mah...eh si, c'è un "mah" e neanche tanto piccolo.
1° - La presenza di bug tanto per cominciare é frustrante e sembra che i dev non siano interessati più di tanto a risolverli quanto ha pubblicare nuovi killer, nuovi survivor e inutilissimi cosmetici, il che porta inevitabilmente a creare nuovi bug.
2° - la dinamica di gioco ha portato i giocatori che ovviamente vogliono vincere (essendo questo lo scopo di un gioco) ad utilizzare sempre i soliti due killer, con le solite abilità e le solite abilità anche per i survivor. É un problema? Io credo di si, visto che come ho già scritto di sopra. Quindi il gioco é totalmente sbilanciato in una sola direzione. 
3° - la mancanza di server dedicati si fa sentire in quanto le partite vengono hostate dal killer quindi se lui ha una connessione scadente si presentano altri problemi di lag. Non ho idea da quanto tempo la community faccia richiesta di server dedicati, ma no! sviluppiamo nuove cose da mettere nel gioco per far spendere soldi alle persone(hanno detto che a fine estate saranno implementati, io non ci credo).
4° - la community é tossica e anche parecchio, perché é un problema? Basta far finta di niente ed ignorarli, ok, si disconnettono dalla partita rovinando il game ad altre persone, e va be dai é un gioco ne faccio un'altra, ok.
E quando queste cose succedono durante una streaming? Questo é un gioco che si presta molto ad essere trasmesso in streaming é divertente da vedere i dev dovrebbero tutelare le persone, soprattutto che fanno grossi numeri portando il loro gioco in live, lo pubblicizzano, consumatori=soldi. Invece, i dev se ne fregano altamente degli streamer, che vengono sniperati e di conseguenza le live vengono rovinate screditando così il gioco a qualcuno che se aveva qualche dubbio magari col cavolo che lo compra. Meglio creare un nuovo cappellino rosa da indossare durante una partita no?

Credo di aver toccato tutti i punti che secondo rovinano l'esperienza di gioco, spero che in futuro vengano fatti dei cambiamenti in favore del gioco e di chi ne usufruisce e non solo in favore del portafoglio di chi lo sviluppa.
Io continuerò a giocarci perché la speranza é l'ultima a morire e come dicevo ha un grande potenziale.

玩游戏差不多三百小时了，对游戏也有了很多的理解，主要玩人类比较多，还是比较刺激的一款游戏，到后面就没感觉了，基本上都是很气，因为自己的一些白给操作，人类玩的就是一些意识和走位，但意识比较重要。
I played this game on PS4 and its awfully dead there but it's still a fun game, enjoyed the games way more on PC and the wait times were little to nothing at all compared to console.

i really enjoy this game, it's great to play with friends, or in a public setting when you don't know anyone LOL  And i haven't really experienced much toxicity in public games, to be honest. Ive mostly experienced very helpful players and very nice people, even sometimes nice killers. Yes, the occasional camping killer but it's okay ..we have all kinds xD  The game is good priced especially on sale, but be warned, you're gonna spend more money if you want some nice new clothing and accessories for your players. :D Also, because the game has alot of players, about 25k on 24 hr peak; it's nice to get a bunch of helpful, kind randoms :D

edit -  haha after almost 200 hours into this game i've experienced toxicity, but i still love this game. so much replayability and so many cool events.

and hundreds of hours later, i'm still buying those premium passes xDD help!

现在玩杀机的都是出于情怀。
作为非对称游戏的鼻祖，杀机真的从可玩性和平衡性都做了各种尝试。
怎么说呢，这个游戏对萌新来说很不友好，非常的不友好。刚开始玩二十段匹配不到人不说，玩人记不住板区秒倒别人不救还有厄咒连电机都修不动，玩鬼虽然二十段但给你匹配的都是绿段的人同样一个LT就给你绕蒙最后四跑。只能说，需要时间去上手。而且血网系统也很需要肝。我玩了一百多小时，才有些游戏体验。最近高段都是怨灵和护士，很难玩。走地屠夫很少，人屠之间的心理博弈也就少了，所以现在我尊重每一个走地屠夫。
新手不会玩可以去看一看巨色的视频。
总之
玩人，秒倒四趴，吃处决被放血，就跟白给的一样
玩鬼，魂牵打击，遇蛇皮王中王，简直是肺都气炸
Play as a killer in the beginning to learn maps and get some game knowledge dont play survivor or u will be frustrated and might break ur keyboard.....MUST TRY

Terrible game. So many issues . As killer, it will take you at least 15 minutes to find a lobby. As survivor, its extremely fun if you like your team sandbagging you and the killer tunneling you or camping pretty much every single game. The majority of lobbys are over 150 ping. Several bugs with certain killers such as huntress,(her hatchets hitting you 5 meters away). The devs said that DEDICATED SERVERS will fix the connection issues but nope, lobbys are still messed up, connection issues. The devs gave freddy a rework after 2 years of people begging for it. Now that hes finally reworked, hes just an unstoppable monster.(unless its your first time playing freddy). Certain perks in the game such as NOED, are hated, and yet, the devs dont care to remove them. Other perks such as rancor, let you ruin the day of one of the survivors. Issues such as camping, and tunneling have been in the game since the release so no point even talking about it. The devs made it harder to rank up if you camp someone except they also made it pretty much impossible to get past purple ranks unless you sit and play the game 24/7.(LITERALLY, although as killer its a bit easier). With all these issues the devs choose to focus on new DLC's such as the new STRANGER THINGS CHAPTER, but hey cant blame them, money is a nice thing to have. They gain more players by new DLC's than they lose the players that realize how terrible the game actually is. Overall a very terrible game, definitly dont recommend it.

Edited Review from 2016:

- This game has been quite the pendulum over the years.  Balance wise major updates swung the favor into either Killer's or Survivors.  As a Killer main the game was a blast.  Even when it slightly moved into giving Survivors a slight edge.  However, since the release of MMR and Boons in August-October 2021, the game has plummeted the fun out of anything as Killer main.

With 5 years experience I could get a 3-4k if I played sweaty with any D-B Killer . Since the update I'm lucky if I get a 2-3K putting in the same sweat with A tier Killers. 
It's extremely frustrating and sad to see pendulum staying far on the side of survivors.

It was fun DBD, but the Golden Age for Killers is long gone. It will be nothing but the Dark Ages from here on out.

Despite only having 26 hours in this game I actually bought this game on launch. It was very fun in the beginning but I lost interest rather fast. However I recently decided to try it after a few years and I must say this game is much better than when it launched. So much has changed since launch that I can understand why this game has maintained popularity after all this time. I would 100% say this is a solid buy and there isn't really any real contenders in this genre either. I feel that survivors and killers are pretty well balanced, there are some instances I find maybe either side could be tweaked but its all very minor and on the whole a good balanced experience (minus a few troll players). Graphics are nothing special, however it actually suits this game and does not exactly look bad

TL:DR It's good, buy it

Как хоррор игра так себе. В этой игре сравнимо с некоторыми её незначительными плюсами есть огромная прорва существенных недостатков. Если коротко, то настроек в игре не хватает (особенно уменьшения громкости отдельных элементов), система рангов и подбора игроков требует полной переработки, необходимо убрать банальную игру в пати и если хочется поиграть пару-тройку часов после работы, а не задрачиваться днями и ночами, то лучше вообще не тратиться на игру.
Касаемо игры в пати. Как разрабы собирались популяризировать навыки, помогающие в координации действий с союзниками, если есть банальные голосовые чаты?
Вопрос конечно риторический и есть понимание того что на куче акков (где куплена только дбд) разрабы поднимут бабла. В итоге идея игры хорошая, реализация отвратительная.
Repetitive but fun.
каеф игра

这是我的第一个差评。当然给差评不是因为游戏不好玩，游戏很好玩。但是作为萌新，基本上了解了这个游戏所有的机制后，却有点不太相信这个游戏到现在已经运营三周年了。因为这更像一个处于测试阶段的游戏，有很多机制不完善，或者游戏制作组根本不打算让这个游戏火起来。
怎么说呢，是一款以恐怖惊悚为主题的不公平对抗游戏。但是，现在网友们硬生生的是玩成了猫和老鼠。。屠夫就是可怜的Tom，被一个一个皮娃子Jerry戏耍。
有以下几点我不能理解游戏制作组Behaviour竟然到现在都还没解决。这么好的一个游戏，匹配机制跟一坨屎一样，19段的屠夫匹配一个小时都他妈的没人。玩家素质差的一批，有的时候一个玩家老是不准备到倒计时10秒的时候退了，我他妈服了，好好改一下匹配机制会死啊？这么多版本了，制作人脑袋被驴踢了吗！

I've had this game for 3 years now. Got it when it first came out because saw some youtubers play it, continued to watch them but I never really played until more recent times. This game is super fun to play, I play both killer and survivor but this game is a real hard grind for the bloodpoints and to get the teachable perks. The people in this game can be super rude and toxic but if you look past that it really is enjoyable ! until you get shitty matches with meta perks or shitty toxic players. I also don't really like how long the grind seems to take, it seems that if you don't grind to master this game then you're never gonna get all the perks you want. Hopefully this next update will help shorten the grind!

Hands down a great game but

the current progress tree to acquire perks is really hard. thus far iv played the game for a long time now but i know the true enjoyment of the game comes when you have all the perks unlocked. basically grind it out guys . i know i have and its worth it but my true desire is to have everything unlocked and ready at my disposal instead of watching other killers on youtube have fun with various perk combinations.
Fun game to play with friends and out-wit a killer who will chase you endlessly OR play as a killer and chase 4 humans and place them on meat hooks! for the glory of the Entity :D

i have invested alot of time in this game and i regret it this is a cash grab using pop media to suck you in the killers are at a major disadvantage and are 0 fun to play the match making takes forever (30+ min on average) and when you find a match it will be with any number of different ranks instead of a ranking system like cs go or siege where u play 10 or so matches then get ranked they start you at the lowest and tell you to crawl your way out so for my first 15 or so levels its a cake walk with 0 difficulty and it cant be fun for the noobs im stomping also half your matches with be with seemingly random ranks. it would be like joining a game of r6s and playing with a copper a plat and 2 golds in ranked lets not even talk about hit boxes or shit mechanics like allowing survivors to just take hits and not be penalized or how about a killer that just gets rid of a survivors only defense a pallet  the devs refuse to listen to the community and have become famous for remarks like "just go play somthing else" in the face of legit frustration from the community they focus on new killers maps and perks but dont realize what we want is a working game not a dumpster fire with cool features
